seriesAbout: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power is a prequel to The Lord of the Rings that takes place in Middle-earth during the Second Age. The story covers the forging of the Rings of Power, the rise of Sauron, the fall of NÃºmenor, and the alliance between Elves and Men.
The Boys is a darkly comedic series about a group of vigilantes who take on corrupt superheroes.
The Great is a satirical, comedic drama about the rise of Catherine the Great from outsider to the longest-reigning female ruler in Russia's history.
Mirzapur is an Indian crime thriller web series that revolves around drugs, guns, and lawlessness in the city of Mirzapur, Uttar Pradesh.
Spartacus is a historical drama series that follows the life of the gladiator Spartacus and his rebellion against the Roman Republic.
